select.loggers: Select which messages you want to see in console output

confirm.delete_user: Do you really want to delete user `{username}`
confirm.delete_database: Do you really want to delete database `{database_name}`

database.empty: There's nothing to see. The table is empty.

moonfile.undefined_command: During the Moonfile parsing, an unknown `{command}` command was detected, it was skipped.
moonfile.no_port_app: [white]APP[/white]: You did not specify [white]`port`[/white]. The default value is [white]{default_port}[/white]

user.need_create_user: First you need to create user
user.low_permissions:
Only a person with `{minimal_permissions}` level access or higher can execute this command. 
You are a `{permissions}` now.
user.self_admin:
You cannot create a user named `{self_admin_name}`. 
It's reserved.

database.not_author:
You are not the creator of `{database_name}`. 
Only the creator can delete the database.

moonfile.no_host_app: [white]APP[/white]: requires two arguments ([white]`port`[/white] is optional, default: [white]{default_port}[/white]). You have not passed [white]`host`[/white]
moonfile.undefined_logger_type: [white]LOG[/white]: accepts only [white]`{default_loggers}`[/white] loggers. Undefined logger was found [white]{undefined_logger}[/white]
moonfile.undefined_user: [white]DATABASE[/white]: first you need to create user. Undefined user was found [white]{undefined_user}[/white]
moonfile.no_params_database: [white]DATABASE[/white]: requires two arguments ([white]`author`[/white] is optional, default: [white]{default_author}[/white]). You have not passed [white]`database name`[/white]
